languages.text: {n}К вам медленно возвращается трезвость сознания. На ваших ладонях нет никаких следов ран. Впрочем, осколки меча тоже бесследно исчезли — и вам начинает казаться, что они были лишь плодом вашего воображения.{/n}
{n}You slowly start regaining clarity of mind. There is no trace of the wounds on your palms. The shards, however, have disappeared as well, which makes you wonder if they ever existed at all.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}К вам медленно возвращается трезвость сознания. На ваших ладонях нет никаких следов ран. Впрочем, осколки меча тоже бесследно исчезли — и вам начинает казаться, что они были лишь плодом вашего воображения.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bit by bit, you start regaining the clarity of mind. There is not even a sign of wounds on your palms. Shards of the sword, however, disappeared, too, which makes you feel like they were a mere play of your imagination.{/n}

{n}Bit by bit, you start regaining the clarity of mind. There is not even a sign of wounds on your palms. Shards of the sword, however, disappeared, too, which makes you feel like they were a mere play of your imagination.{/n}
{n}You slowly start regaining clarity of mind. There is no trace of the wounds on your palms. The shards, however, have disappeared as well, which makes you wonder if they ever existed at all.{/n}
{n}You slowly start regaining clarity of mind. There is no trace of the wounds on your palms. The shards, however, have disappeared as well, which makes you wonder if they ever existed at all.{/n}
{n}You slowly start regaining clarity of mind. There is no trace of the wounds on your palms. The shards, however, have disappeared as well, which makes you wonder if they ever existed at all.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的头脑开始慢慢恢复清醒，手掌上的伤口已经没了踪迹。然而，那些碎片也不见了，你不禁开始怀疑它们是否真的存在过。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You slowly start regaining clarity of mind. There is no trace of the wounds on your palms. The shards, however, have disappeared as well, which makes you wonder if they ever existed at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的头脑开始慢慢恢复清醒，手掌上的伤口已经没了踪迹。然而，那些碎片也不见了，你不禁开始怀疑它们是否真的存在过。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous recouvrez lentement vos esprits. Vous ne trouvez aucune trace de blessures sur vos paumes. En voyant que les fragments ont eux aussi disparu, vous ne pouvez pas vous empêcher de vous demander s'ils ont réellement existé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You slowly start regaining clarity of mind. There is no trace of the wounds on your palms. The shards, however, have disappeared as well, which makes you wonder if they ever existed at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous recouvrez lentement vos esprits. Vous ne trouvez aucune trace de blessures sur vos paumes. En voyant que les fragments ont eux aussi disparu, vous ne pouvez pas vous empêcher de vous demander s'ils ont réellement existé.{/n}

languages.text: {n}意識がだんだんとはっきりし始める。手のひらに傷の痕跡は見当たらない。だが、欠片も同じく消え失せており、最初から存在していたのかさえわからなくなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You slowly start regaining clarity of mind. There is no trace of the wounds on your palms. The shards, however, have disappeared as well, which makes you wonder if they ever existed at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}意識がだんだんとはっきりし始める。手のひらに傷の痕跡は見当たらない。だが、欠片も同じく消え失せており、最初から存在していたのかさえわからなくなった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lentamente recuperas tu claridad mental. No queda ni rastro de las heridas de tu mano. Sin embargo, los fragmentos han desaparecido también y empiezas a preguntarte si existían en primer lugar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You slowly start regaining clarity of mind. There is no trace of the wounds on your palms. The shards, however, have disappeared as well, which makes you wonder if they ever existed at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lentamente recuperas tu claridad mental. No queda ni rastro de las heridas de tu mano. Sin embargo, los fragmentos han desaparecido también y empiezas a preguntarte si existían en primer lugar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du kannst langsam wieder klar denken. Auf deinen Handflächen ist keine Spur der Wunden zu sehen. Die Splitter jedoch sind ebenfalls verschwunden. Du fragst dich, ob sie überhaupt je existiert haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You slowly start regaining clarity of mind. There is no trace of the wounds on your palms. The shards, however, have disappeared as well, which makes you wonder if they ever existed at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du kannst langsam wieder klar denken. Auf deinen Handflächen ist keine Spur der Wunden zu sehen. Die Splitter jedoch sind ebenfalls verschwunden. Du fragst dich, ob sie überhaupt je existiert haben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yavaş yavaş zihnin berraklaşıyor. Avuçlarındaki yaralara dair hiçbir iz görmüyorsun. Parçalar da ortadan kaybolmuş. Acaba parçalar gerçek miydi diye merak ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You slowly start regaining clarity of mind. There is no trace of the wounds on your palms. The shards, however, have disappeared as well, which makes you wonder if they ever existed at all.{/n}
